entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
